about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Combining Ancient Wisdom With Modern Medicine
about.quote: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
about.paragraph1: Maison Healing was founded with the mission of bringing comprehensive healing experiences, combining traditional Eastern medicine and modern science.
about.paragraph2: We recognize that while Western medicine and psychotherapy play important roles in disease management, the root causes of symptoms are often not thoroughly addressed.

soundHealing.title: Sound Healing
soundHealing.description: Using Tibetan singing bowls, gongs, and sacred instruments to create healing frequencies, helping to balance body energy.

meditation.title: Meditation
meditation.description: Guided meditation sessions to help you connect with your inner self, release tension, and find peace.

yoga.title: Yin Yoga
yoga.description: Practice holding postures for extended periods to open meridians and improve emotional balance.

breathwork.title: Breathwork
breathwork.description: Pranayama and Holotropic breathing techniques to control the mind and enhance inner energy.

retreat.title: Retreat & Workshop
retreat.description: 2-3 day retreat courses in nature, combining multiple healing methods.
